definitions: in a manner displaying fineness of texture or structure and intricate workmanship

examples.text: a silk dress delicately embroidered in gold
his book is complex and delicately layered

shortDefinitions: in manner displaying fineness of texture or structure and intricate workmanship

definitions: in a pleasantly subtle and subdued manner; lightly
shortDefinitions: in pleasantly subtle and subdued manner

definitions: in a very careful or finely judged manner; gently

examples.text: she took the jewel in her hands, holding it delicately

shortDefinitions: in very careful or finely judged manner

definitions: in a highly sensitive or thoughtful way; tactfully

examples.text: that's a sensitive issue that has to be approached delicately

shortDefinitions: in highly sensitive or thoughtful way

definitions: in a way that is easily upset or affected

examples.text: the game was delicately balanced approaching half-time

shortDefinitions: in way that is easily upset or affected
